insert into nodejs_match_item_pigeon_collection ( item_collection_id, match_id, cote_id, cote_name, collection_id, collection_ringnum, collection_pigowner, item_id, parent_item_id, item_name, create_time, modify_time ) values
( #{item.item_collection_id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.match_id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.cote_id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.cote_name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.collection_id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.collection_ringnum,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.collection_pigowner,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.item_id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.parent_item_id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.item_name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.create_time,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{item.modify_time,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} )
